Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the class IIa bacteriocin
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Closely related Lactobacilli, Listeria monocytogenes and ivanovvi, Enterococcus faecalis, Carnobacterium sp and Brocothrix thermosphacta.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Structure Description: In DPC micelles, the cationic and hydrophilic N-terminal half of the peptide forms an S-shaped beta-sheet-like domain stabilized by a disulfide bridge and a few hydrogen bonds. This domain is followed by a helix-hinge-helix motif: a hydrophilic 6-mer helix (residues 19-24) and an amphiphilic/hydrophobic 11-mer helix (residues 29-39).

Literature.Author: Tichaczek PS, Vogel RF, Hammes WP.
